Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/boot/dualboot

What you'll find here: boot Linux from other OSs

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

bootmenu/
DOS executable boot menu useful for dual-boot systems
bootpa22.zip (LSM entry) 1998-08-22
add Linux partition on the NT Boot loader menu (25525 bytes)
lodlin16.tgz (LSM entry) 1996-05-04
loads kernel from DOS w/ bzImage, initrd support (87210 bytes)
setboot-1.4.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-07-24
OS/2 setboot utility for Linux and DOS (20341 bytes)
setboot-patch.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-06-07
eliminates the message "MBR of /dev/hdb has bad magic number" (816 bytes)
